Automatically Track Writing Progress Across Your Whole School

Mark My Words: Revolutionising education by tracking every skill, for every student, on every assessment — performing thousands of hours of evaluation nightly.

Book Demo

Backed by Leading Institutions

University of Melbourne
Swinburne University

Why is writing never tracked?

High Volume

Students produce a vast amount of written work across subjects

Time Constraints

Teachers lack time to thoroughly assess each piece of writing

Fragmented Insights

Difficulty in consolidating writing skills across subjects

Countless Skills to Assess

Why is this a problem?

Without a skill development system, schools face a fragmented and inefficient assessment process, leading to:

Inconsistent Feedback

Varying quality and depth of feedback across teachers and subjects

Delayed Interventions

Late identification of students needing additional support

Limited Progress Tracking

Difficulty in monitoring long-term writing skill development

Make it easy to implement and evaluate your whole-school approach to literacy

  • Monitor progress across all subjects
  • Monitor progress across all subjects
  • Generate insightful, actionable reports to guage the effectiveness of your interentions
Learn More

Heads of English

Streamline your department's workflow with AI-enhanced tools and data-driven insights

  • Build moderation into the marking process
  • Gain insights into student, class and cohort performance
  • Ensure every teacher provides great feedback all the time.
Learn More

School Leaders

Transform your school with AI-powered insights, enabling data-driven leadership and fostering a culture of innovation.

  • Get a 360° view of your school's writing progress
  • Leverage predictive analytics for informed decision-making
  • Ensure every student at your school is identified and supported
  • Reduce the feedback worload of your teachers
Learn More

Teachers

Leverage AI to streamline grading and provide personalised, impactful feedback to your students.

  • AI-assisted evaluation with natural language feedback
  • Automatically annotate typed or handwritten work
  • Use real time analytics to become a more impactful teacher
